item.description:
just an FYI that this awesome band is playing, at Whips, if anyone would like to host/hostess, for a Pre-thanksgiving celebration. I have company coming, but may sneak out after for a dance, if I can get in by then.
It's Pam K.'s birthday (she's in the pic), and she would looooove some company for it...sorry, I can't committ Pam, as I don't know what time my company will be leaving, and I just can't shoo them out the door...lol. But I do need to get out and dance BAD!!!
put in your reply, if you'll be going for dinner at 7-7:30, the earlier you arrive the better, as this band really rocks the house.
hope to see you all soon...susan
item.how_to_find_us: hopefully, someone will bring a meetup sign...lol

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Souled Out Show Band!
